QuestData.Title: Land of Opportunity
QuestData.Description:
<The grandmaster's voice rings out over the roaring crowd.>
This is it! The final event of the tournament!
These two Maldraxxi gladiators have cut down challenger after challenger. Now the only thing left...
Is for one to slay the other!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: A brutal warrior of Maldraxxus. The returning champion from previous tournaments.
QuestData.RewardText:
In ages past, the Primus founded that tournament to showcase the might of Maldraxxus.
Today, it has sparked an all-out war.
